about.pageSubtitle: A journey through centuries of Georgian winemaking tradition
about.storyText: The story of Mogzauri Wine Cellar began with a love of viticulture, a path our family followed faithfully for many years. Building on accumulated knowledge and experience, in 2023 we moved into winemaking with one goal: to unite vine and wine into a single story and carry that experience into every bottle. Mogzauri Wine Cellar is tireless work, constant exploration, and a journey toward a perfect taste.
about.vineyardText: Our wines are born in the village of Arkhiloskalo, where our vineyards of Rkatsiteli, Kisi, Pink Rkatsiteli, and Saperavi are cultivated. This allows us to maintain complete and continuous quality control from vine to bottle. Special care and love for the vineyards create wines with unique character and distinct individuality.

visit.pageSubtitle: Experience the beauty of Georgian winemaking firsthand
visit.descriptionText: Step into a world where ancient tradition meets modern hospitality. Our estate offers an immersive experience into the heart of Georgian winemaking, surrounded by breathtaking vineyard landscapes and the warm spirit of Caucasian culture.
visit.tastingText: Join our guided tasting sessions where you will explore our full collection alongside traditional Georgian dishes. Our sommelier will guide you through the unique characteristics of each wine, sharing stories of the land and the craft behind every bottle.
